title: Culture research on ACES and health for elderly

content.question: Why would Dr. Lloyd be interested in studying the social and cultural backgrounds of the residents with kidney disease, heart disease, and stroke?

choices.label: Because these health conditions are not experienced as often by those with ACEs.
Because sociocultural background can influence individuals’ perceptions of ACEs.
Because these individuals were less likely to have received medical attention for their health conditions.
Because Dr. Lloyd would like to prevent hindsight bias in his research.

content.answer: Because sociocultural background can influence individuals’ perceptions of ACEs.

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
